description: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Liverpool: Did you know?
title: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Liverpool: Did you know?
title_page: Nottingham Forest 1-1 Liverpool: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext:
No side have gained more points from losing positions than Liverpool in the Premier League this season (14).
Meanwhile, Diogo Jota scored with his first touch just 22 seconds after coming off the bench â€“ it is Liverpool's fastest substitute goal on record (since 2006-07) in a Premier League match.
